SEARCH
Package Presentation

Class LibrarianController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.LibrarianController
@Component public class LibrarianController extends Object
Controller for the librarian dashboard.

Handles viewing media items, detecting overdue items, and performing searches.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibrarianController

      @Autowired public LibrarianController(LogoutService logoutService, FxmlNavigator fxmlNavigator, LocalSessionManager sessionManager, BooksService bookCountService, CdCountService cdCountService, MediaItemService mediaItemService, AllCdService allCdService, MediaItemSearchService mediaItemSearchService, UserCountService userCountService, OverDueCountService overDueCountService, OverdueItemDetector overdueItemDetector)
      Creates the librarian controller with injected services.
      Parameters:
      logoutService - service used to handle logout operations
      fxmlNavigator - navigator used to change FXML views
      sessionManager - session manager providing the current user
      bookCountService - service to count the number of books
      cdCountService - service to count the number of CDs
      mediaItemService - service to manage media items
      allCdService - service to retrieve all CDs
      mediaItemSearchService - service used for media item search
      userCountService - service to count users by role
      overDueCountService - service to count overdue items
      overdueItemDetector - detector for users with overdue items
